original_text: If you sleep with a prostitute, that may cost the price of a meal. But if you sleep with another man's wife, you may pay with your life. If you sleep with a prostitute, that may cost the price of a meal. But if you sleep with another man's wife, you may pay with your life. If you sleep with a prostitute, that may cost the price of a meal. But if you sleep with another man's wife, you may pay with your life.
korean_text: 음녀로 말미암아 사람이 한 조각 떡만 남게 됨이며 음란한 여인은 귀한 생명을 사냥함이니라

sentences.original_text: If you sleep with a prostitute,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 네가 창념과 함께 잠을 자면,

sentences.original_text: that may cost the price of a meal.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 한 끼 식사 값 정도일 수 있다.

sentences.original_text: But if you sleep with another man's wife,
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 만약 네가 다른 사람의 아내와 함께 잠을 자면,

sentences.original_text: you may pay with your life.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 네 목숨으로 대가를 치를 수 있다.
